fields.name: transaction_type
fields.type: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','paid contract','withdrawal','subordinate rebate','refund for withdrawal failure')
fields.comment: 交易类型：广告免费合约/每日签到免费合约/邀请免费合约/付费合约/提现/下级返利/提现失败退款
fields.columnType: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','paid contract','withdrawal','subordinate rebate','refund for withdrawal failure')

fields.name: transaction_amount
fields.comment: 交易金额（比特币数量，精确到18位小数）

fields.name: points_earned
fields.comment: 每日签到获得的积分（固定4积分）

fields.name: bonus_multiplier
fields.comment: 挖矿速度加成倍数（可选）

fields.name: points_earned
fields.comment: 获得的里程碑奖励积分

fields.name: free_contract_type
fields.type: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','bind referrer free contract')
fields.columnType: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','bind referrer free contract')

fields.name: mining_status
fields.comment: 挖矿状态：已完成/挖矿中/错误

fields.name: user_id
fields.comment: 推荐人用户ID（获得返利的用户）

fields.name: subordinate_user_id
fields.comment: 被推荐人用户ID（下级用户）

fields.name: invitation_code
fields.comment: 被邀请用户自己的邀请码

fields.name: referrer_user_id
fields.comment: 推荐人用户ID（邀请者ID，可为空表示无推荐人）

fields.name: referrer_invitation_code
fields.comment: 推荐人的邀请码（使用的邀请码，可为空）

fields.name: contract_type
fields.type: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','paid contract')
fields.comment: 合约类型：广告免费合约/每日签到免费合约/邀请免费合约/付费合约
fields.columnType: enum('ad free contract','daily sign-in free contract','invitation free contract','paid contract')

fields.name: mining_status
fields.comment: 挖矿状态：已完成/挖矿中/错误

fields.name: points_change
fields.comment: 积分变动（正数增加，负数减少）

fields.name: related_user_id
fields.comment: 关联用户ID（如邀请人/被邀请人）

fields.name: milestone_count
fields.comment: 达成次数（10人里程碑可多次）

fields.name: points_earned
fields.comment: 获得积分（1人=6积分，10人=30积分）

fields.name: user_id
fields.comment: 用户唯一标识符（格式：U+年月日时分秒+5位随机数）

fields.name: invitation_code
fields.comment: 用户的邀请码（格式：INV+年月日时分秒+4位随机数）

fields.name: country_multiplier
fields.comment: 国家挖矿速度倍率，默认1.00

fields.name: order_status
fields.comment: 订单状态：激活中/续费中/完成/错误/退款申请中/退款成功/退款被拒

fields.name: available_points
fields.comment: 可用积分（扣除已消耗的）

fields.name: user_status
fields.type: enum('active within 3 days','no login within 7 days','disabled','deleted','normal')
fields.comment: 用户状态：3天内活跃/7天未登录/已禁用/已删除/正常
fields.columnType: enum('active within 3 days','no login within 7 days','disabled','deleted','normal')

fields.name: last_balance_update_time
fields.comment: 上次余额更新时间（用于增量计算）

fields.name: withdrawal_status
fields.comment: 提现状态：成功/处理中/已拒绝
